subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: ... Not sure about *should*, but I don t think it would hurt much, and in fact would have some advantages, yes. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
> If you think the private keyword should be just a suggestion, then I
> think we will just have to agree to disagree at this point.

Not sure about *should*, but I don't think it would hurt much, and in fact
would have some advantages, yes.

Cheers, Ilja
